simumatch.datamanager

Class AbilitiesData

  • java.lang.Object
    • simumatch.datamanager.AbilitiesData

  • public final class AbilitiesData
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores data about the abilities of the game, as a single map from Actions to Effects.

      • addAction

        public void addAction(Action action,
             java.util.List<Effect> effects)
        Adds an action to this object. If the action already exists, the effects are replaced.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to add
        effects - The effect to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if action or effects are null or effects contains a null

      • getEffects

        public java.util.List<Effect> getEffects(java.util.Map<Action,? extends java.lang.Number> actions,
                                boolean sorted)
        Parameters:
        actions - The actions to retrieve effects from and their cardinality
        sorted - Whether to sort the result list
        Returns:
        The effects of the actions
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actions contains a null value
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if actions contains a negative value.
